markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Living Waterfall](/Monsters.aspx?ID=197)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Living waterfalls are humanoid-shaped columns of churning water.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/ElementalWater_LivingWaterfall.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Living Waterfall](/Monsters.aspx?ID=197)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 152</row>

**Perception** +10; darkvision

**Languages**
[Aquan](/Languages.aspx?ID=14)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** -2

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Water-Bound** When not touching water, the living waterfall is slowed 1 and can’t use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 90

**Immunities**
bleed, paralyzed, poison, sleep

**Resistances**
fire 5

**Vortex** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) 30 feet. Water in the area that is in the same body of water as the living waterfall is difficult terrain for Swimming creatures that don’t have the water trait.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, swim 60 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
wave +15 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+7 bludgeoning plus Push or Pull 5 feet

**Drench** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) The elemental puts out all fires in a 5-foot emanation. It extinguishes all non-magical fires automatically and attempts to counteract magical fires (+14 counteract modifier).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-45" />
name: Living Waterfall
